txt.en: Saplings can be found just south of Felegoth.\n\nYou should gather saplings that are to be planted around the forest.
The time has come to plant these saplings.
Really, you must come and visit me in Rhosgobel one of these days!
You should return to Radagast, who can be found at the tree nursery just outside of Felegoth.
Fertile soil and dead trees can both be found throughout Eryn Lasgalen.\n\nYou should clear away the dead trees and plant the saplings in fertile soil around the forest.

'The time has come to plant these saplings which have been growing strong under my care. Will you help me by gathering the saplings and planting them within the forest? You may need to clear some of the dead trees, which are too far gone. Such is nature's way. \n\n'A wood of greenleaves is upon us, my friend. We need but put our elbows into it to see it through.'
The saplings Radagast has been cultivating are ready for replanting.
'The trees were planted well? Good, good! I knew I could count on you. Really, you must come and visit me in Rhosgobel one of these days!'
